analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/44/0x7657c23126570e2dd5fea2e7d37e21ac65feb143.sol:
	Contract BRICBITToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/44/0x7657c23126570e2dd5fea2e7d37e21ac65feb143.sol#236-237)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
